description: Explore the history and evolution of the Python programming language
Gather information on key features and advantages of using Python
Identify popular application domains and industries that heavily utilize Python
Research popular Python libraries and frameworks (e.g. NumPy, pandas, Flask)
Investigate the role of Python in data science, machine learning, and web development
Compile a list of commonly used Python data structures and control flow statements
Learn about best practices for coding in Python, including coding style and debugging techniques
Find popular Python IDEs (Integrated Development Environments) and editors for coding
Identify key Python documentation resources, including official documentation and online tutorials
